briefdescription.para: Special PWM mode for current mode.
HRTIM ADC Event Number and its associated source.

para.verbatim: There are a huge number of possibilities, for now this code explores only a few.

simplesect.para: Please Prioritize cmp3, because cmp4 and cmp2 might be used for current mode, and cmp1 is used for duty cycle
